Type of Setup: {!Compactor_Setup_Type}

Regular Powerwashes Required: {!ch_CMP_PowerWash}

Delivery Details

SLA Date/Time: {!var_TobeUpdatedSLADateTime}

Delivery Date: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.Delivery_Date__c}

Removal Date (if applicable): {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.Removal_Date__c}

SLA Override Reason: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Override_Reason__c}

SLA Override Comment: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Override_Comment__c}

Onsite Contact: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.Site_Contact__c}

Onsite Contact Number: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.Site_Contact_Phone__c}

Position: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SalesMeet_Container_Position__c}

Placement Instructions: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.User_Input_Work_Order_Instructions__c}

Quote Only: {!Quote_Only}

General Ledger: {!GL_Number}

choices.name: ch_Placement_HoursofOperation
choices.choiceText: There are restricted hours in which the vendor can provide service

userInput.promptText: During which hours should service be provided?

choices.name: ch_Placement_LockedRestrictedArea
choices.choiceText: The service will be located in a restricted area (locked enclosure, fenced in area)

userInput.promptText: How should the vendor gain access?

choices.name: ch_Placement_PushInOutService
choices.choiceText: The servicing driver will need to push out or push in the container during each service

choices.name: ch_SCH_Daily
choices.choiceText: Daily (Every day, or every week day)

choices.name: ch_SCH_Monthly
choices.choiceText: Monthly (Every number of months or on specific days of a month)

choices.name: ch_SCH_Weekly
choices.choiceText: Weekly (Multiple times per week or once every number of weeks)

choices.name: ch_SCH_Yearly
choices.choiceText: Yearly (Every number of years, or on a specific day of the year)

formulas.name: CalculatedSLA_DateTime
formulas.expression: IF(OR( ISBLANK( {!offset}),ISBLANK({!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c}) ), "", MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 6, 2 ) & "/" & MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 9, 2 ) & "/" & LEFT( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 4 ) & " " & TEXT( IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), 12, VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) &":"& MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 15, 2 ) &" "& IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c} + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) & " " & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!var_locationTimezone})), {!var_locationTimezone},"") )

formulas.name: var_TobeUpdatedSLADateTime
formulas.expression:
IF(OR( ISBLANK( {!offset}),ISBLANK({!var_CurrentCaseRecord.SLA_Service_Date_Time__c}) ), "",
MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 6, 2 ) & "/" & MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 9, 2 ) & "/" & LEFT( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime})+ {!offset} /24 ), 4 ) & " " & TEXT( IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), 12, VALUE( MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) &":"& MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 15, 2 ) &" "& IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( IF({!Is_SLA_Update_Required}, {!ConvertedDeliveryDateTime},{!var_CaseSLADateTime}) + {!offset} /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) & " " & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!var_locationTimezone})), {!var_locationTimezone},"") )

Flow.label: New Service Flow -Same AssetType

fields.name: PlacementDetailsHelp
fields.fieldText: The below questions may not be applicable, however we should collect this information to ensure we're able to deliver and provide service with minimal issues.

fields.name: Container_will_be_placed_in_a_restricted_area_such_as_a_locked_enclosure_or_fenc
fields.fieldText: Container will be placed in a restricted area, such as a locked enclosure or fenced in zone

fields.name: The_location_has_restricted_hours_of_operations
fields.fieldText: The location has restricted hours of operations and service cannot be provided outside of those hours

fields.name: The_container_will_need_to_be_pulled_out_and_pushed_in_by_the_servicing_vendor
fields.fieldText: The container will need to be pulled out and pushed in by the servicing vendor

fields.name: If_any_of_the_above_were_selected_please_document_service_instructions_below
fields.fieldText: If any of the above were selected, please document service instructions below

fields.name: roplacementhelp
fields.fieldText: The below questions may not be applicable, however we should collect this information to ensure we're able to deliver and provide service with minimal issues.

fields.name: Container_placed_in_restricted
fields.fieldText: Container will be placed in a restricted area, such as a locked enclosure or fenced in zone

fields.name: Hours_of_Operation_restrictions
fields.fieldText: The location has restricted hours of operation and service cannot be provided outside of those hours

fields.name: roll_off_placement_instructions
fields.fieldText: If any of the above were selected, please document the service instructions below

fields.name: BillingDetailsHelp
fields.fieldText: Some customers also provide specific details on how to bill them. Please review the Authorization Notes to confirm any additional billing details that may be needed, and provide input on each of the below fields.

fields.name: BillingDetailsHelp_0
fields.fieldText: Some customers also provide specific details on how to bill them. Please review the Authorization Notes to confirm any additional billing details that may be needed, and provide input on each of the below fields.

fields.name: IssueWithCC
fields.fieldText: An issue has been encountered with retrieving company categories. If you have been provided a specific company category please document it below and a setup representative will include it in their setup steps.

fields.name: SummaryHelp
fields.fieldText: A summary of your selections can be found below. Please review and verify that everything is correct. If everything is correct, please press "Next".

fields.name: CaseAssignmentHelp
fields.fieldText:
The case will be assigned as follows in Acorn:


Team: {!var_CurrentCaseRecord.Team_Queue__c}

User: {!var_UserName}

validationRule.errorMessage: Please select either same or different Asset Type.
Please select either same or different Asset Type.

fields.name: commercialAccessoriesDisclaimer
fields.fieldText: Using the below, please indicate if the customer has requested any specific dumpster accessories. Please ensure the customer is aware that none of these accessories are guaranteed. WM will request that the vendor provide these accessories, however availability is dependent upon vendor inventory.

fields.name: DumpsterStyleHelp
fields.fieldText: Please select below if the customer has expressed an interest in a specific style of Dumpster.

fields.name: AccessoriesHelp
fields.fieldText: Using the below checkboxes, please indicate if the customer has requested any of the following accessories for their Dumpster.

fields.name: CommOccHelp
fields.fieldText:
Please select how service will be provided for this container:


Scheduled - The customer can specify a regular pickup schedule, and to receive additional services they will need to request Extra Pickups

On-Call - In order to receive service the customer must call WMSBS to request the service

fields.name: OwnershipHelp
fields.fieldText: A customer may provide their own unit, however need a receiver box. They may also own all equipment and need us simply to setup service on it. Using the below choices, please identify the type of compactor setup this is.

fields.name: CMPAccessoriesHelp
fields.fieldText:
There are some accessories that may be available for the compactor as well. Using the below please verify if the customer is requesting any of the following services be setup alongside delivery.


Permanent powerwash services being established are most common for grocery customers.

fields.name: FrequencySelectionHelp
fields.fieldText: You've selected a scheduled service. Please use the below to indicate the frequency type. Upon selecting a frequency type, the next screen will ask for the specific frequency details (for example, 3 times weekly service.)

fields.name: LidsSelectionHelp
fields.fieldText:
Plastic lids are the standard for lid types.


Do not check the below unless the customer has explicitly requested metal lids. These are not common.

fields.name: LockPreferenceHelp
fields.fieldText: In some circumstances the vendor may be able to provide a specific style of lock for a dumpster. If the customer has a preference on the style of lock that they receive, please select it below.

fields.name: LockStyleDisclaimer
fields.fieldText:
Please ensure the customer is aware that the style of lock is not guaranteed. We will request that the vendor provide this type of lock, however the style of lock they receive will depend on the vendor's inventory.


If locks and keys are delivered, please indicate below how many of each the customer would like.

fields.name: SelectionReminderHelp
fields.fieldText: What kind of waste stream will the customer be disposing of?

fields.name: Brief_description_of_the_material
fields.fieldText: Description of Material Being Disposed Of:

validationRule.errorMessage: Description of waste stream should be less than 80 characters

fields.name: OffsiteHelp
fields.fieldText: Please enter the address where the service should be setup with the vendor below.

validationRule.errorMessage: Length of the postal code should not exceed 10 characters

fields.name: OffsiteAddressHelp
fields.fieldText:
Please select the type of service that is being setup.


  • Standard Delivery (Most Common and Default)
    • The service is being setup at the customer's location and will follow the corporate office's standard billing rules
  • Offsite Address
    • The customer has requested that the service is setup at an address different than the location's address
  • Locally Billed (Uncommon)
    • The customer wishes to receive invoices specifically for this container to a local billing address

fields.name: OpenTopAncillaryHelp
fields.fieldText: Using the below checkboxes, please indicate if the customer has requested any of the below attributes. If the customer has requested a specific style or attribute to their Open Top, please select "Other" and type a brief description of the customer's request.

fields.name: OccurrenceHelp
fields.fieldText: Please select how service will be provided for this container: Scheduled - The customer can specify a regular pickup schedule, and to receive additional services they will need to request Extra Pickups Scheduled On-Call - The customer can specify a regular pickup schedule, and they may also call in additional work orders when needed On-Call - In order to receive service the customer must call WMSBS to request the service

fields.name: PaperworkHelp_0
fields.fieldText: Some customers and some materials require specific paperwork as part of the setup, or after each service. If the Customer, Vendor, or Account rules requires specific documentation please check the appropriate box below.

fields.name: Certificate_of_Destruction
fields.helpText: Certificate of Destruction is required when a customer is disposing of sensitive information, such as brand-specific products

fields.name: Landfill_Tickets
fields.helpText: Landfill Tickets may be required for each haul when the customer must provide diversion reporting to a local legislative body (such as a City or County)

fields.name: PermDeliveryHelp
fields.fieldText: This Client's SLA is - {!CalculatedSLA_DateTime}

fields.name: PermOnsiteHelp
fields.fieldText: Please obtain onsite contact information, as well as any special instructions for the vendor that pertains to fulfilling the new service.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid 10 digit phone number without spaces

fields.name: QuantityHelp
fields.fieldText: You had selected a quantity of {!Quantity}. Please complete the below fields to ensure the correct types of Sanitation Units are delivered.

validationRule.errorMessage: The combined quantity of Standard and Handicapped should equal {!Quantity}. Please review and change.

fields.name: AdditionalInformationHelp
fields.fieldText: If a handwash station is also required, please provide information regarding the station below.

fields.name: flowError
fields.fieldText:
An error has occurred while performing these actions. Please provide the following message to your administrator.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: FrequencyHelp
fields.fieldText: Please select how service will be provided for this container: On-Call - In order to receive service the customer must call WMSBS to request the service Scheduled On-Call - The customer can specify a regular pickup schedule, and they may also call in additional work orders when needed

fields.name: ServiceSelectHelp
fields.fieldText: Please select the type of {!var_LOB} service from the product type catalog below:

fields.name: Quantity
fields.helpText: The number of containers required to be delivered. If a roll off line of business is selected and a value greater than one is entered, the system will create separate cases for each container.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please verify the quantity selected. Note that when Roll Off is selected, the quantity cannot be set to greater than 1.

fields.name: SizeSelectionHelp
fields.fieldText:
A {!var_EquipmentName} is typically measured in {!v_UOM}. The sizes typically range between {!v_MinimumSize} {!v_UOM} and {!v_MaximumSize} {!v_UOM}.


Using the below, please choose the requested size.

fields.name: SizeSelectionHelp_0
fields.fieldText:
A {!var_EquipmentName} is typically measured in {!v_UOM}. The sizes typically range between {!v_MinimumSize} {!v_UOM} and {!v_MaximumSize} {!v_UOM}.


Using the below, please choose the requested size.

fields.name: SLADateTimeText
fields.fieldText:
SLA Date/Time 

{!CalculatedSLA_DateTime}

fields.name: TempSLADateTime
fields.fieldText:
SLA Date/Time 

{!CalculatedSLA_DateTime}

validationRule.errorMessage: The removal date, if specified, must be greater than or equal to the delivery date

fields.name: OnsiteContactHelp
fields.fieldText: Please obtain onsite contact information, as well as any special instructions for the vendor that pertains to the delivery.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid 10 digit phone number without spaces

variables.description: The information that will be used to populate the Case Comments long text area when the case is finished
